structure.splashContent:
Thank you very much. By using PicMealUp, you are also supporting the Charity Project www.breakfastforsmile.com. Indeed, we plan to generate, in the near future, the revenue by launching the paid version of PicMealUp or the advertising model. Then after, we commit to give 20% of the revenue to support www.breakfastforsmile.com

If you would like to join PicMealUp Community, please do create your account and interact with other Members.

splash.paragraph: Thank you very much for using PicMealUp. By using PicMealUp, you are also supporting the NGO project www.breakfastforsmile.com. Indeed, we commit to give 20% of the revenue to Breakfast For Smile.
If you would like to join PicMealUp Community, please login or create your account and interact with other Members.

home.title: Home
home.paragraph: PicMealUp helps you to know what to order from a restaurant menu which is not in your language.

lists.list: Take a photo of the restaurant menu.
Select the name of the meal, then execute the search to find the related pictures.
View and add the pictures into your order list.

picmeal.title: Pic Meal
picmeal.paragraph: Thank you very much for using PicMealUp.
By using PicMealUp, you are also supporting the NGO project www.breakfastforsmile.com. Indeed, we commit to give 20% of the revenue to Breakfast For Smile

olists.list: Make sure that the text is on a flat surface, with a good lighting and no shadows.
When taking the picture, make sure it is clear. And the bigger the better.

About PicMealUp App

content.heading: What ?
content.paragraph: PicMealUp means Picture Meal Up … Simply because PicMealUp is a mobile application which helps to find the pictures of the meals from the restaurant menus.

content.heading: Why ?
content.paragraph: When you travel to foreign countries for business or leisure, so often you are struggling to order the meals because the restaurant menus are in foreign languages and don’t have any pictures to help you.
With PicMealUp, you don’t need to speak the foreign languages. Just take a picture of the menu, then select the name of the meals and execute the search of the pictures.
Thanks to the pictures, you know what the meals look like to. And this helps you to order exactly what you would like to eat.

content.heading: Who ?
content.paragraph: As a frequent traveler, I often find myself helpless with the restaurant menus in my hands, for the reasons above.
So I create PicMealUp to help travelers to find the pictures of the meals so that we know what to order… and discover new taste, new flavor, anytime, anywhere we go and enjoy…

section.contact: Contact Send Please, describe your problem: Write Message >

allcontactlists.title: Contacts
allcontactlists.noresult: No members in your contact List

panelbody.paragraph: In the rural areas of Cambodia, children walk several kilometers on an empty stomach to get to school.
They sit in a crowded classroom amidst heat and hunger, eventually losing their attention and concentration.
Breakfast For Smile aims to provide each child with a breakfast before school time.
The Breakfast For Smile vans deliver delicious breakfasts to children in the rural areas and at parks located in-front of schools.
The daily hearty breakfast consists of porridge or noodles, an omelet and fruit.

By using PicMealUp, you are also supporting the Charity Project www.breakfastforsmile.com.Indeed, we plan to generate, in the near future, the revenue by launching the paid version of PicMealUp or the advertising model. Then after, we commit to give 20% of the revenue to support www.breakfastforsmile.com
OCR, Optical character recognition, is the electronic conversion of scanned or photographed images of typewritten or printed text (restaurant menu, ...) into computer-readable text.
To use PicMealUp, it's simple:

lists.list: Use your mobile device camera to take the picture of the restaurant menu
Convert the scanned menu into computer-readable text
Define the name of the meal, then execute the search
View the pictures of the meal and add to your order list

panel.paneltitle: How do I select the name of the meal for the search?

lists.list: From the scanned menu, press any name of the meals to display the feature "Define | Search & Display Pictures"
Adjust the selection of the name of the meal

panel.paneltitle: How do I delete my account?

panelbody.paragraph: Open PicMealUp and go to PicMealUp Setting > Delete Account

panel.paneltitle: How do I report abuse from a contact?

lists.list: Open PicMealUp and go to PicMealUp Chat > Members Nearby
Click the name of the Contact
Select the type of Report Abuse

panelbody.paragraph: A contact that you have flagged as Report Abuse can not see you in the Members Nearby list nor send you greeting anymore.

panel.paneltitle: How do I block or unblock a contact from contacting me?

lists.list: Open PicMealUp and go to PicMealUp Chat > Members Nearby
Click the name of the Contact
Check the type of Report Abuse to block the contact or Uncheck to unblock the contact

panelbody.paragraph: A contact that you have flagged as Report Abuse can not see you in the Members Nearby list nor send you greeting anymore.
On rare occasion, you may encounter issues connecting to PicMealUp.
This is usually caused by a problem with the internet connection of your mobile device, or a problem with your wireless carrier or Internet Service provider.
Most connnections issues can be resolved by checking the settings parameters of your mobile device. Mobile device > Setting Wi-Fi

panel.paneltitle: How can I invite my friends to join PicMealUp?

panelbody.paragraph: If your friends are not yet using PicMealUp, it is easy to invite them to join in!
You can send a PicMealUp invitation via our Tell a Friend / Invite feature.

lists.list: Open PicMealUp and go to PicMealUp Setting > Tell A Friend
Choose how you would like to invite your friends, by email, message, Facebook or Twitter

panel.paneltitle: My PicMealUp account has been deactivated!

panelbody.paragraph: We deactivate accounts if we believe the account activity is in violation of our Terms of Service. Please review our Terms of Service to learn more about the appropriate uses of PicMealUp.!
We cannot comment on the individual reasons of each account deactivation. However, specific actions such as the following may eventually result in your account becoming deactivated.

lists.list: Sending ads or any other form of commercial solicitation.

Submitting content, profile pictures or messages, that are in violation of our Terms of Service such as unlawful, obscene, threatening, harassing, hateful, racially or ethnically offensive or any other inappropriate material.
Using an automated system or an unauthorized / unofficial client application to send messages through PicMealUp.

panelbody.paragraph: Please be aware that we may not issue a warning before deactivating your account. If you think your account was deactivated by mistake you can email us and we will look into your case.
72 hours after your account has been deactivated, your friends will no longer be able to see you in PicMealUp.
Please note that PicMealUp reserves the right to refuse service for any reason without prior notice, at our sole discretion.

panel.paneltitle: Is it free to search the pictures of the meals or send messages over PicMealUp?

panelbody.paragraph: Provided you have an adequate internet data plan for your mobile phone, it is free to search the pictures of the meals or send and receive messages and media over PicMealUp.

PicMealUp uses your phone internet connection to search the pictures of the meal or to send and receive messages, pictures, audio, video, location, and contacts. As long as your phone is not roaming and you have not exceeded your data limit, activities over PicMealUp should not cost you extra
If you are concerned about data usage, we recommend that you use a Wi-Fi connection, if possible

PicMealUp for iPhone requires iOS 4.3 or later. For the best experience, we recommend you use the latest version of iOS available for your phone. Please read this Apple Support article (http://support.apple.com/kb/HT4623) to learn how to update your iPhone software
Please note: iPod devices are not supported at this time.

panel.paneltitle: PicMealUp Chat is deleted every 24 hours!

panelbody.paragraph: When you send or receive messages, we temporarily store the contents of those messages on the devices of recipients.
Once all recipients have viewed a message, we automatically delete the message from PicMealUp app on the recipients devices every 24 hours.

Additionally, we cannot guarantee that deletion of any message always occurs within a particular timeframe. We also cannot prevent others from making copies of your messages (e.g., by taking a screenshot). If we are able to detect that the recipient has captured a screenshot of a chat that you send, we will attempt to notify you.
You should not use PicMealUp to send messages if you want to be certain that the recipient cannot keep a copy.
